quotes.quote: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: So many books, so little time.
quotes.author: Frank Zappa

quotes.quote: A room without books is like a body without a soul.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.quote: You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.quote: Be the change that you wish to see in the world.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: A friend is someone who knows all about you and still loves you.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: Always forgive your enemies; nothing annoys them so much.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people exist, that is all.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Without music, life would be a mistake.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: We accept the love we think we deserve.
quotes.author: Stephen Chbosky

quotes.quote: Imperfection is beauty, madness is genius and it's better to be absolutely ridiculous than absolutely boring.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: It is never too late to be what you might have been.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: It does not do to dwell on dreams and forget to live.
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling

quotes.quote: Life isn't about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Winston S. Churchill

quotes.quote: There is no greater agony than bearing an untold story inside you.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Everything you can imagine is real.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: Do one thing every day that scares you.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
quotes.author: Wayne Gretzky

quotes.quote: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: The journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: The best way to predict your future is to create it.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Your time is limited, so don’t waste it living someone else’s life.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.quote: It always seems impossible until it's done.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: Not all those who wander are lost.
quotes.author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quotes.quote: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Dream big and dare to fail.
quotes.author: Norman Vaughan

quotes.quote: The best revenge is massive success.
quotes.author: Frank Sinatra

quotes.quote: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: You can't blame gravity for falling in love.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Love yourself first and everything else falls into line.
quotes.author: Lucille Ball

quotes.quote: Keep your face always toward the sunshine—and shadows will fall behind you.
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.quote: Try to be a rainbow in someone else's cloud.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Nothing is impossible. The word itself says 'I'm possible!'
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.quote: You are enough just as you are.
quotes.author: Meghan Markle

quotes.quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Don’t wait. The time will never be just right.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill
